name: Exiled Princess Prototype
description:
DISCLAIMER: Highly recommend you download EXE version not use the WebGL version as it is missing features/can't support higher end graphics rendering.

Prototype for a simple run with some attacking/movement. Let us know what you think, open to comments/suggestions which you can leave below.

Goal is just to test fighting other enemies, getting attacked, jumping, using knock back.

Controls (most only set up with xbox 360 controller, may be different with others)

WASD/Arrows/Joystick with controller to move

Left click or X on controller - light attack

Right click or Y on controller - heavy attack

F or LB - knock back attack (takes HP)

Shift or RB - Block

D-PAD can be used in the menu as well.
